channel.title: JFrame (Galkon, I know you're out there somewhere answering client questions!)
channel.description: How do I add a JFrame to my client? Since there are really no add model tutorials i was gonna add an 'Add models' button on my client but I don't have a JFrame. Help me out here?

item.title: JFrame (Galkon, I know you're out there somewhere answering client questions!)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

public static MyFrame frame;

In your Main Method:

MyFrame frame = new MyFrame(); boolean isResizable = false; frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE); frame.setTitle("MyFrame's Name"); frame.setSize(400 , 400);

You can do way more… That’s very basic.

Read full topic
item.source: JFrame (Galkon, I know you're out there somewhere answering client questions!)
